text: ane ame te lokone, ke je ghanam asakta hata, dharatina purva ane pascimana malika banavi didha, jemam ame barakata muki che ane tamara palanaharanum pavitra vacana, isra'ilana santana mate te'ona dhirajana karane purum tha'i gayum ane ame phira'auna ane teni komani banavati vastu'one nasta kari nakhi, ane unci unci imaratone pana nasta kari didhi
